Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw a basic representation of a string telephone with two cups and a string connecting them (shows basic elements of the device).
The student can attempt to depict two students holding the device, suggesting usage for communication (indicates basic function).
CANNOT: The student might not accurately depict how sound travels through the string (may not show sound waves or vibrations).
The student might leave out or incorrectly label some materials involved, such as labeling the cups as 'metal' or missing the string completely (incomplete or incorrect labeling).
The student might not clearly show how the device can send or receive information, missing arrows or sound lines indicating direction (lacks clear indication of sound transmission).
The student might overlook explaining why the device is an important communication solution, not conveying the purpose beyond the basic function (doesn't communicate significance).
